action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the book on the table, the plate on the table and the mop on the table.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a bedroom now. There are a wardrobe, a pillow and a bed. The wardrobe is closed. The pillow is on the bed. There is a passage to a hallway here.
The wardrobe is now open. The wardrobe is empty.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a living room, a bedroom, a broom closet and a kitchen here.
You are in a living room now. There are a book, a side table, a couch, a chair, a table and a shelf. The book is on the side table. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You take the book. In your inventory you have a book.
You can't go to a kitchen from here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a living room, a bedroom, a broom closet and a kitchen here.
You are in a broom closet now. There are a broom and a mop. The broom is on the floor. The mop is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You take the mop. In your inventory you have a mop and a book.
You can't go to a living room from here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a living room, a bedroom, a broom closet and a kitchen here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a plate. The cupboard is closed. The plate is on the counter. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
I don't know how to interpret this 'drop' action.
You can't go to a living room from here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a living room, a bedroom, a broom closet and a kitchen here.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a couch, a chair, a table and a shelf. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You put the book on the table.

> put mop on table
> put plate on table
> done
You put the mop on the table.
You can't see a plate here.
You can't go to a kitchen from here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a living room, a bedroom, a broom closet and a kitchen here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a plate. The cupboard is closed. The plate is on the counter. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.

> take plate
> go to living room
You take the plate. In your inventory you have a plate.
You can't see a table here.
You can't go to a living room from here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a living room, a bedroom, a broom closet and a kitchen here.
You are in a living room now. There are a book, a side table, a mop, a couch, a chair, a table and a shelf. The book is on the table. The mop is on the table. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You put the plate on the table.
Model produced DONE action at turn 29, end episode.
